gameDetails.name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small â€“ Even More Buildings Big and Small
gameDetails.description: Like the first expansion for Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small, Agricola - Even More Buildings Big and Small includes 27 new buildings for use with the base game as well as a fifth Stall tile and a farm expansion. Examples of new buildings include the "Hofzimmerei" ("Carpentry Yard"), "Rent­amt" (which costs you three points but gives you a fourth worker), and "Vieh­markt" (which lets you trade reeds for any animal).
